pages.text: Hello potential miner and welcome in the Deep Rock Galactic Family! You are one of the luckily dwarfs which were chosen to (maybe) become a real dwarf. Here, you will learn everything about this.

$(l)MISSION I$()$(br2)So, welcome to your first mission! You mission is to get some minerals. At least $(br)$(#ceae99)$(list1)5 iron ores$() $(#f9b600)$(list1)2 raw bismor$() $(#cfd517)$(list1)1 raw cropper$(). $(br2)To find these Minerals, $(o)Deep Rock Galactic$() provides you with $(l:minerals_and_resources)information$() where to find all these minerals.
$(l)MISSION II$()$(br2)Found it? Good work, miner! Now, smelt the stuff in (blast) furnace into ingots. Now you can use your crafting table to craft a $(l:blocks/equipment_table)Equipment Table$().
$(o)We hope you are that smart to know how to make iron$()
